name: MxxConverterRedemption
description: Mxx Converter Redemption Contract. Contract to allow server (owner) to mint bMxx on the BSC chain.

functionDecorators.name: approveRedeem
functionDecorators.description: This function approves the redeem after the cool-down period.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: - The id of the redeem record. Access Control: Only Owner, Not Paused.

functionDecorators.name: isOwner
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: recordRedeem
functionDecorators.description: This function adds a new redeem record and starts the cool-down timestamp.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: - The id of the redeem record.

parameterDecorators.name: _fromAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - The source address on ETH blockchain.

parameterDecorators.name: _toBscAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - The destination address on BSC blockchain.

parameterDecorators.name: _mxxAmt
parameterDecorators.description: - The amount of Mxx token for the conversion.

parameterDecorators.name: _feePcnt
parameterDecorators.description: - The fee percent. Access Control: Only Owner, Not Paused.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _pause
parameterDecorators.description: - Set pause or un-pause. Access Control: Only Pauser.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawFees
functionDecorators.description: This function allows the owner to withdraw the bMxx fee.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: - The amount to withdraw. Access Control: Only Owner.
